<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memprofiler-cpp-/memprofiler/#a823d078fa3a7f1991784035f738da320"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memprofiler-cpp-/memprofiler/#a823d078fa3a7f1991784035f738da320">MemProfiler::maybeInsertMemProfInitAtFunctionEntry</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each NSObject descendant having a +load method, this method is invoked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by the ObjC runtime before any of the static constructors is called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Therefore we need to instrument such methods with a call to &#95;&#95;memprof&#95;init</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at the beginning in order to initialize our runtime before any access to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Build maps of the location hash to all profile data with that leaf location</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::map&lt;uint64&#95;t, std::set&lt;const AllocationInfo &#42;&gt;&gt; LocHashToAllocInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A hash function for std::unordered&#95;set&lt;ArrayRef&lt;Frame&gt;&gt; to work.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">CallStackHash &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> operator()(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Frame&gt;</a> CS)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a22834e90a038045330c1385f188104f5">computeFullStackId</a>(CS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the callsites we need to record slices of the frame array (see comments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// below where the map entries are added).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::map&lt;uint64&#95;t, std::unordered&#95;set&lt;ArrayRef&lt;Frame&gt;, CallStackHash&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LocHashToCallSites;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;AI : MemProfRec-&gt;AllocSites) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumOfMemProfAllocContextProfiles++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Associate the allocation info with the leaf frame. The later matching</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code will match any inlined call sequences in the IR with a longer prefix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of call stack frames.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t StackId = <a href="#a59956a56d1a2c15842922d6c2ba8de18">computeStackId</a>(AI.CallStack&#91;0&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LocHashToAllocInfo&#91;StackId&#93;.insert(&amp;AI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ProfileHasColumns |= AI.CallStack&#91;0&#93;.Column;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;CS : MemProfRec-&gt;CallSites) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumOfMemProfCallSiteProfiles++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Need to record all frames from leaf up to and including this function,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as any of these may or may not have been inlined at this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;StackFrame : CS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t StackId = <a href="#a59956a56d1a2c15842922d6c2ba8de18">computeStackId</a>(StackFrame);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LocHashToCallSites&#91;StackId&#93;.insert(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Frame&gt;</a>(CS).drop&#95;front(Idx++));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ProfileHasColumns |= StackFrame.Column;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Once we find this function, we can stop recording.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StackFrame.Function == FuncGUID)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Idx &lt;= CS.size() &amp;&amp; CS&#91;Idx - 1&#93;.Function == FuncGUID);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GetOffset = &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;DIL) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DIL-&gt;getLine() - DIL-&gt;getScope()-&gt;getSubprogram()-&gt;getLine()) &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">           0xffff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now walk the instructions, looking up the associated profile data using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// debug locations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;BB : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isDebugOrPseudoInst())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are only interested in calls (allocation or interior call stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// context calls).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CallBase&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CalledFunction = CI-&gt;getCalledFunction();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CalledFunction &amp;&amp; CalledFunction-&gt;isIntrinsic())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// List of call stack ids computed from the location hashes on debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// locations (leaf to inlined at root).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;uint64&#95;t, 8&gt;</a> InlinedCallStack;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Was the leaf location found in one of the profile maps?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LeafFound = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If leaf was found in a map, iterators pointing to its location in both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the maps. It might exist in neither, one, or both (the latter case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can happen because we don&#39;t currently have discriminators to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distinguish the case when a single line/col maps to both an allocation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and another callsite).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::map&lt;uint64&#95;t, std::set&lt;const AllocationInfo &#42;&gt;&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iplist">::iterator</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">          AllocInfoIter;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">decltype</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(LocHashToCallSites)<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iplist">::iterator</a> CallSitesIter;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;DIL = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getDebugLoc(); DIL != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlight">           DIL = DIL-&gt;getInlinedAt()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use C++ linkage name if possible. Need to compile with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -fdebug-info-for-profiling to get linkage name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name = DIL-&gt;getScope()-&gt;getSubprogram()-&gt;getLinkageName();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Name.empty())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CalleeGUID = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a71ee7e63264e4997a3340a781d44832e">Function::getGUID</a>(Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackId = <a href="#a59956a56d1a2c15842922d6c2ba8de18">computeStackId</a>(CalleeGUID, GetOffset(DIL),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      ProfileHasColumns ? DIL-&gt;getColumn() : 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we have found the profile&#39;s leaf frame. If yes, collect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the rest of the call&#39;s inlined context starting here. If not, see if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we find a match further up the inlined context (in case the profile</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// was missing debug frames at the leaf).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LeafFound) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">          AllocInfoIter = LocHashToAllocInfo.find(StackId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CallSitesIter = LocHashToCallSites.find(StackId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AllocInfoIter != LocHashToAllocInfo.end() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">              CallSitesIter != LocHashToCallSites.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">            LeafFound = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LeafFound)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">          InlinedCallStack.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(StackId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If leaf not in either of the maps, skip inst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LeafFound)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First add !memprof metadata from allocation info, if we found the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction&#39;s leaf location in that map, and if the rest of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction&#39;s locations match the prefix Frame locations on an</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AllocInfoIter != LocHashToAllocInfo.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only consider allocations which support hinting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a38c8e31049a8ae175aaac38c00f83279">isAllocationWithHotColdVariant</a>(CI-&gt;getCalledFunction(), TLI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We may match this instruction&#39;s location list to multiple MIB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contexts. Add them to a Trie specialized for trimming the contexts to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the minimal needed to disambiguate contexts with unique behavior.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memprof/callstacktrie">CallStackTrie</a> AllocTrie;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t TotalSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t TotalColdSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/allocinfo">AllocInfo</a> : AllocInfoIter-&gt;second) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the full inlined call stack against this one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we found and thus matched all frames on the call, include</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this MIB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#afb0d2b520c6cf9984ec6a40e7af31dca">stackFrameIncludesInlinedCallStack</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/allocinfo">AllocInfo</a>-&gt;CallStack,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 InlinedCallStack)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">            NumOfMemProfMatchedAllocContexts++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">            uint64&#95;t FullStackId = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a6fe321e46b55ad5aded316c01dcb0bf6">ClPrintMemProfMatchInfo</a> || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/memoryprofileinfo-cpp/#a696467f077d0e94dc6b3f171acc6be25">MemProfReportHintedSizes</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="#af7e93a7f4bbea37887b3fc9be720b8d0">MinClonedColdBytePercent</a> &lt; 100)</span></CodeLine>
